levels.description: Immediately fire an arrow that deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK damage <@ba.vup>{times}</> times in a row. The arrow can repeatedly ricochet to nearby enemies that have not been targeted yet (each ricochet reduces available ricochets by 1); <@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charges</>
